name: CyberSTEAL
description:
CyberSTEAL is a first-person action shooter where you're tasked with making your way through levels, collecting three keys to open a vault, and getting the treasure inside to your escape van.

You can move with WASD, jump with the space bar, shoot with your left mouse button, and reload with "R."

CyberSTEAL was made by Team Coal-Lab Studios for COM 419 - Professional Game Productions
